about_the_game:
Step into the unnerving depths of psychological horror with The Oldest View: Rolling Giant, a singleplayer/co-op found footage horror game. Unravel the mysteries buried beneath an abandoned shopping center as you and your friends navigate a labyrinth of terror, where every corner hides a new nightmare.

In The Oldest View: Rolling Giant, you are part of a team of urban explorers, drawn to the ominous depths of a long-forgotten shopping center. What starts as a thrilling adventure soon spirals into a horrifying descent as you uncover the dark secrets lurking beneath the surface. Experience true psychological horror in a co-op setting, where every decision could be your last.
  • Found Footage Horror: Immerse yourself in the game’s realistic found footage style, enhancing the eerie atmosphere and sense of dread.
  • Co-op Gameplay: Team up with friends or face the terror alone. Coordinate with your team to solve puzzles, uncover clues, and survive the horrors that await.
  • Abandoned Shopping Center: Explore the hauntingly detailed environment of an underground shopping center, abandoned and decayed, yet teeming with unseen horrors.
  • Psychological Terror: Encounter mind-bending scenarios that challenge your perception of reality and test your sanity.
  • Dynamic Storytelling: Unveil the dark history of the Rolling Giant through environmental storytelling, cryptic recordings, and disturbing visuals.

Can you and your friends withstand the terror and escape the subterranean nightmare? Or will the horrors of the Rolling Giant consume you?

Prepare to confront your deepest fears in The Oldest View: Rolling Giant.

Features:

  • Immersive Co-op Experience: Collaborate with up to 4 players in an intense multiplayer mode, or brave the darkness solo for a truly solitary horror experience.
  • Atmospheric Sound Design: Experience spine-chilling soundscapes and ambient audio that heighten the terror.
  • Puzzle Solving: Work together to solve complex puzzles that reveal the grim story of the abandoned shopping center.
  • Replayability: Multiple endings and secrets ensure that each playthrough offers a new experience.

Mature Content Warning: This game contains intense psychological horror, disturbing imagery, and themes not suitable for all audiences. Player discretion is advised.

Dare to descend? Add The Oldest View: Rolling Giant to your wishlist now and prepare for the ultimate co-op horror experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 750ti or higher with 2GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 3GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050 or higher with 2GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
